name: Stickers
description:
Stickers is a plat-former where you are a square.

You can shoot and move with a push of one button.

Hold this button to move farther and shoot bigger projectiles.

Your goal is to get to the bright blue square of every level

Left click to move and shoot

R to restart the level

Theme: Sticky Justice

Achievements Completed:

3-bit color palette

Just shapes

Maverick
